org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color.Color
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorGRAY, ColorHSV, ColorRGBA

    public abstract class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a color in any color space
